title: BBC Our World 2016 Afrikaners on the Edge 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVG
description:
Afrikaners on the Edge

Sociopolitical Documentary hosted by Benjamin Zand, published by BBC broadcasted as part of BBC Our World series in 2016 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/9/91/Afrikaners-on-the-Edge-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
More than 20 years after the end of apartheid, some Afrikaners claim their language, and culture, are being marginalised. For Our World, Benjamin Zand meets Afrikaners who fear for their future in the Rainbow Nation.
